title: After a scare, NASA’s Mars helicopter safely takes to the skies again
summary: "The helicopter worked as planned and executed an immediate landing."

title: Dish and EchoStar agree terrestrial and space connectivity merger
summary: Satellite TV broadcaster and terrestrial wireless operator Dish Network announced plans Aug. 8 to merge with EchoStar, its sister company focused on providing broadband services from space.

title: Space Development Agency to expand satellite ground operations in North Dakota
summary: The Space Development Agency announced plans to build a new satellite testing facility at Grand Forks Air Force Base, North Dakota.

title: ExoTerra gains flight heritage for Halo thrusters
summary: ExoTerra Resources has demonstrated its first Halo Hall-effect thrusters in orbit on DARPA Blackjack satellites.

title: Funded for further growth, Leaf Space prepares its ground station network for the upcoming SpaceX’s Transporter-9 mission and shares excitement for the sector
summary: As recently announced by Leaf Space, the Italian company has now secured EUR 20M (USD 22M) in Series B funding, positioning itself among the world’s leading Ground Segment-as-a-Service (GSaaS) providers. […]
